summary: Inspired by Wolverine Hall Well House by Korana for Morrowind. A small house inside a well south of Riften next to the Snow Shod Farm.  It's great for role playing a sneaky character or anyone who likes living in caves.
descriptionHtml:
Riften Well House
Author: Mentha
Version: 1.0
Release Date: November 08, 2012
Category: Houses

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requirements:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Skyrim

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

A small house inside a well south of Riften next to the Snow Shod Farm.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Details:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Riften Well House was inspired many years ago while playing Morrowind. One of my favorite house mods was the Wolverine Hall Well House by Korana. It was a very small and simple house perfect for somebody just starting out. When I saw InsanitySorrow's resource of Morrowind style paper lanterns, I remembered this small house and I knew I had to try a well house of my own. While my house is a bit larger than Korana's house, I think I've at least partially got the feel of one of her wonderful mods.

I hate begging, but please endorse this mod if you like it. My husband said when I get 100 endorsements on any one of my mods, he'll download it.

Included in Version 1.0:

A small beginners house with a player bed, follower bedroll, crafting, enchanting, alchemy, fishing, storage, and relaxing. It is located outside Riften next to the Snow Shod Farm with it's own unlocked map marker.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
More Colorful Mods 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Skyrim:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70307/?]More Colorful Critters[/url] 
Over 150 more critters to shout at. 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69710/?]More Colorful Clothing[/url]
adds over 300 female clothes, shoes, boots, sandals, wedding wreaths, and gloves to the game all craftable
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25701/?]More Colorful Alchemy Plants[/url]
This is a resource with a small sample mod to show you what the plants look like in the game. Each plant has a corresponding ingredient. The sample plants are behind Jorrvaskr.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25939/?]More Colorful Shrooms[/url]
This is a resource with a small sample mod to show you what the mushrooms look like in the game. Each 'shroom has a corresponding ingredient. The 'shrooms in game are on the road in front of Pelagia Farm.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25960/?]More Colorful Ferns[/url]
This is a resource with a small sample mod to show you what the plants look like in the game. The plants in game are on the grounds around Jorrvaskr.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26057/?]Markarth Botanical Gardens[/url]
An eye candy mod with a living area, new alchemy plants, and a new world space to call home. Live there, hunt there, or harvest and run. 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26485/?]Falkreath Overlook Farmhouse[/url]
A small house above Falkreath with lots of landscaping, new alchemy plants, and crafting and storage areas. 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26192/?]More Colorful Trees & Shrubs[/url]
Tree resource with a small sample mod to show the trees in game. Look on the road between the western watchtower and Whiterun stables.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26632/?]Riften Well House[/url]
Argonian house next to Riften South Gate. Inspired by Wolverine Hall Well House by Korana for Morrowind. 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28228/?]Solitude Tree House Shack [/url]
(optional General Stores compatibility) 
Small house with a lot of landscaping on the island next to Solitude Sawmill.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70193/?]A Place to Stay[/url]
Inspired by "A Good Place to Stay" mod by Simstar for Morrowind. Adds a Dwemer house next to Pelagia Farm with mannequins for each of the types of armor in Skyrim with quite a few to spare for armor mods. 

Fallout 3:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout3/mods/21878/?]More Colorful Clothing FO3 Edition[/url]

Fallout NV:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/newvegas/mods/61435/?]More Colorful Clothing Fallout NV Edition

[/url]Fallout 4:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/16022/?]More Colorful Harvest & More[/url]
Adds wild plants, planters, terrariums, aquariums, benches, tables and more to the crafting menu. 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/16473/?]Food Drive Favorites
[/url]What ever happened to all those cans of beans anyway? [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/16372/?]
More Colorful Bathroom Art[/url]
Which is correct, over or under? The world may never know.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/16664/?]More Colorful Commonwealth[/url]
Adds a little color to the grasses of the Commonwealth
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/17306/?]More Colorful Fishy Stuff
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/17314/?]More Colorful Potted Plants
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/23433/?]More Colorful General Merchandise[/url]


Skyrim Special Edition:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1380/?]Dunmer Ranger Armor SE[/url] 
Adds 5 sets of light armor, each in the colors of a Dunmer great house
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1370/?]More Colorful Clothing SE[/url] 
Adds over 300 different clothing, & shoe options for vanilla female body, also adds a few options for males

[/url]over 300 different kinds of critters & plants to harvest

There has been a push for the emperor to legalize skooma in Tamriel, show your support with a legalize skooma shirt

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/14507]More Colorful Ferns SE[/url]

[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/15160]Largashbur Wise Woman's Hut

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Change log:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1.0
Release

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Installation:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1) Extract the contents of the ZIP folder into a temporary folder
2) Cut & Paste files to your Data folder
3) Turn on the mod.
4) Have fun


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Un-Installation:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

1) Delete the files associated with the mod
2) Unless it's game breaking, or I forgot something keep your criticism to yourself. You are not required to use this mod.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Incompatibility:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Since this mod only has a well in the vanilla world, there should be no incompatability. If there is you are free to move the well.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bugs:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

none that I know of

This is not a bug, the non vanilla plants do not drop ingredients.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Korana for inspiration

Paper lantern resources by InsanitySorrow @ TES Alliance - http://tesalliance.org/forums/

Recolored Monstera by Mentha

Recolored trees, shrubs, mushrooms, candle, alchemy plants, snowberry wreaths & banner by Mentha... See above for links

To The Good Lord
Bethesda for creating Skyrim.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Tools Used:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Nifskope
GIMP
CK

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You may NOT upload this file to any other site without my permission.
Please use the before mentioned links to use the new meshes in this file.
author: Mentha
